The Arithmetic mean is used to find an average value among all in the list, it is calculated by adding all the values and then dividing by their number.
The Weighted average is used to add weights to the values, so they make a greater difference in the final average, it is used to calculate scores of different weights, for example.
"In a set of values, to calculate the harmonic mean, we divide the number of elements by the sum of the inverse of each of the elements in the set."
